page.topic: Setting Focus to a Control on a Dialog
page.description: It is a common requirement, after opening a dialog box, to set focus to a specific control. You can add Javascript to your A5W page to move the focus to any of its controls.

step.example: ...

step.description: The name of the form follows the name= parameter of the <form> tag. In this case the form's name is "Set_Field_Focus". The name of the field (that is to receive focus) follows the name= parameter of the <input> tag. In this case the field's name is "TELEPHONE".
Save the dialog component and place it on an A5W page.
Open the new page in the HTML Editor.
Modify the <body> tag to include something like:
Change "form" to the name of your form (in this case "Set_Field_Focus"). Change "field" to the name of the field that is to receive focus (in this case "TELEPHONE").
